## ProgressWindowOptions.hideDelay property

Delay (in ms) before closing the window after all items complete. This allows the window to reappear quickly if a new item is added. Set to `true` for default 3000ms, `false` to close immediately, or a number for custom delay. Default: true (3000ms)

**Signature:**

```typescript
hideDelay?: boolean | number;
```
